word:
I thought, "I have an appointment to speak in the hall at Sydney, and I should fill that appointment."  The horse continued his business of kicking, . . . but I believe the angel of God was on the scene. . . . Sister Starr, 


                                    -88- 

Emily and I hustled out over the door, for we could not open it in our haste, and thank the Lord we all landed safely on the ground without a bruise. We had turned off from the main thoroughfare just in time and were on a bystreet. We made our way to a pile of rocks by the roadside, put my cushion on one, and I was seated upon it, and Sister Starr and Emily found similar seats. . . .
